required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Determinants of Muscle Strength in Chronic Kidney Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Determinants of Muscle Strength in Chronic Kidney Disease

brief_summary.textblock:
Aim of this study is to determine in chronic kidney disease patients:
- the involvement of malnutrition inflammation and atherogenesis syndrome (increase in C reactive protein and decrease in serum albumin) on voluntary muscle strength impairment
- the relationship between voluntary muscle strength and muscle mass
- the relationship between voluntary muscle strength and lean body mass
- the correlation between voluntary muscle strength and physical activity

detailed_description.textblock:
Aim of this study is to determine in chronic kidney disease patients:
- the involvement of malnutrition inflammation and atherogenesis syndrome (increase in C reactive protein and decrease in serum albumin) on voluntary muscle strength impairment (estimated by handheld dynamometer)
- the relationship between voluntary muscle strength and muscle mass (estimated by creatinine index)
- the relationship between voluntary muscle strength and lean body mass (estimated by bioelectrical impedance analysis)
- the correlation between voluntary muscle strength and physical activity (the physical activity being estimated by the "Voorrips" score questionnaire)

primary_outcome.measure: Voluntary muscle strength evaluated by handheld dynamometer
primary_outcome.description: data will be measured in Newton.meter

secondary_outcome.measure: Muscle mass estimated by creatinine index evaluation
secondary_outcome.description: data will be obtained from plasma creatinine level and will be expressed in milligram/kilogram/day)

secondary_outcome.measure: Lean body mass evaluated by electrical bioimpedance analysis
secondary_outcome.description: data will be expressed in kilogram

secondary_outcome.measure: Physical activity estimated using the "Voorrips" score questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: the score represents the daily physical activity according to a validated scale
the parameter will be measured in milligram/liter
the parameter will be measured in gram/liter

arm_group.description: single evaluation (the day of inclusion) of muscle strength (by handheld dynamometer), muscle mass (by creatinine index estimation), lean body mass (by electrical bioimpedance analysis), physical activity (by "Voorrips" score questionnaire), inflammatory and nutritional status.

intervention.description: Evaluation of muscle mass using plasma creatinine level
Evaluation of C reactive protein and albumin

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- chronic kidney disease patient with extrarenal replacement therapy by hemodialysis for at least 3 months
- stable clinical condition (absence of infection, stroke or acute decompensation)
Exclusion Criteria:
- chronic kidney disease without extrarenal replacement therapy
- history of renal transplantation

overall_official.affiliation: CHU Lapeyronie, Department of Biochemistry and Hormonology, Montpellier, FRANCE
